column1:
INSTRUCTIONS: PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING CAREFULLY BEFORE BEGINNING WORK IN THE IMSP TABULATION WORKSHEET.  Read the instructions for each tab below.  

TABULATION WORKSHEET
- Download this worksheet to your desktop and save a MASTER copy. Do not operate this worksheet on Google documents.  
- Begin my adding the  name of the PNMs in "LAST NAME, FIRST NAME" format. 
- Add her recruit ID from Campus Director and/or ICS
- Add PNM scores from each sister's score card on the resposnes tab, once added the average should appear 

THIS IS A CONFIDENTIAL WORKSHEET. IT SHOULD NOT BE SHARED OUTSIDE OF YOUR CHAPTER AND SHOULD BE DELETED PERMANENTLY WITHIN 24 HOURS OF BID DAY.
